index.title: Business Insurance Today
index.heading: Protecting Small and Medium Businesses
paragraphs: Business Insurance is one of the most essential tools for safeguarding companies of every size — and especially small and medium enterprises that face daily risks and challenges.

From changes in legislation that make certain coverages mandatory, to the increasing impact of climate change and extreme weather events, today’s businesses need to be prepared for threats that can disrupt operations, reduce profitability, or damage their reputation.

For SMEs, the right insurance is not a luxury — it is a necessity. Solutions such as property and equipment coverage, liability protection, credit and guarantee insurance, or coverage against business interruption and loss of profits, provide a vital safety net tailored to your needs.
With a well-designed insurance strategy, your business remains resilient and protected, allowing you to focus on growth and opportunity with peace of mind.

about_me.title: About Me
about_me.heading: About Me
paragraphs: I’ve been working in the insurance field since 1997, helping businesses and individuals secure coverage that truly fits their needs.

My background in science, I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Chemistry from Kansas State University (1987) - and my early career as a Quality Control Supervisor in the pharmaceutical industry, taught me the value of precision, reliability, and clear communication.
In 1997, Ι reoriented my professional path, shifting from ensuring the quality of medicinal products to ensuring the quality of people’s lives after a random, unforeseen and damaging event.

In recent years, I’ve specialized in corporate insurance solutions for small and medium-sized businesses, while continuing to support individuals with health, property and automobile insurance policies.
My approach to your insurance related issues is direct, clear, and personalized. I believe that insurance should not feel like another puzzle in your life - but like what it truly is: a safety net.

parts.content: Secure your business assets against fire, theft, vandalism, and natural disasters. Commercial property insurance ensures your building, equipment, and inventory are protected—minimizing downtime and financial loss after unexpected events.
When operations stop, bills don’t. Business interruption insurance helps cover lost income, rent, and employee wages during unexpected closures—keeping your business afloat while you recover.
If your business uses vehicles, protect them and your team. Commercial auto insurance covers accidents, theft, and liability—keeping your operations moving smoothly and legally.

Protect your business from costly lawsuits due to third-party injuries, property damage, or personal injury claims. General liability insurance is essential for any business that interacts with clients or the public—safeguarding your reputation and finances.
Even experts make mistakes. Professional liability insurance covers claims of negligence, errors, or omissions in your services—crucial for consultants, freelancers, and service-based businesses.
Selling products? You need this. Product liability insurance covers legal and medical costs if your product causes harm—protecting your finances and brand from potential lawsuits.
Don’t let an HR issue derail your business. EPLI covers claims like wrongful termination, discrimination, or harassment—essential protection as your team grows.
Protect your team and your company. Workers’ compensation covers medical bills and lost wages if an employee gets injured at work—ensuring compliance and reducing the risk of lawsuits.

Provides medical coverage for your employees and their families, enhancing their sense of security and well-being in the workplace. The coverage may include hospitalization costs, diagnostic tests, and preventive check-ups, making it a valuable tool for attracting and retaining talented personnel.
Shield your leadership team from personal financial loss due to decisions made in their roles. D&O insurance protects your business’s key people from lawsuits over mismanagement or breach of duty.
Safeguard your company’s future. Key person insurance provides a financial safety net if a critical employee or founder dies or becomes disabled—helping your business stay stable in uncertain times.
One data breach can devastate your business. Cyber liability insurance covers the costs of cyberattacks, data breaches, and IT failures—ideal for companies handling sensitive or digital information.

Covers legal expenses and representation for your business in case of disputes with suppliers, customers, employees, or public authorities. It ensures that you can defend your interests without the burden of unexpected legal costs.
Secure your family’s financial future in case of unforeseen events. Life insurance provides stability and support when it matters most.
Access quality healthcare when you need it most. Health insurance covers hospitalization, diagnostic tests, and medical expenses—ensuring you and your loved ones are well taken care of.
Build a strong financial foundation for the future. Pension and savings plans help you prepare for retirement, combining flexibility with long-term security.
Protect your home and belongings from fire, theft, natural disasters, and unforeseen damages. Home insurance provides peace of mind and financial security for you and your family.
Choose from third-party liability or comprehensive coverage to stay protected on the road. Car insurance safeguards you against accidents, theft, and unexpected costs.
Get expert legal assistance when you need it. Legal insurance covers the costs of legal advice, representation, and proceedings—helping you face disputes with confidence.
Take care of your furry friends. Pet insurance helps cover veterinary expenses, treatments, and emergencies—so your pets stay happy and healthy.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.body: Your privacy is important. This Privacy Policy explains what personal data we collect, how we use it, and your rights under applicable data protection laws.

sections.title: Data We Collect
sections.body:
We may collect personal data that you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and message content when submitting the contact form.

We also use Google Analytics to collect anonymous usage data (e.g., page visits, device type, browser). This data is aggregated and cannot be used to identify individual users.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.body:
Your personal data is used only to:

- Respond to inquiries submitted through the contact form
- Improve the website’s functionality and user experience
- Analyze traffic trends through Google Analytics

We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.body: We retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described above or as required by law. Anonymous analytics data may be retained for longer periods for statistical purposes.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.body:
You have the right to:

- Request access to the personal data we hold about you
- Request correction or deletion of your data
- Withdraw consent to data processing (e.g., by rejecting cookies)

To exercise these rights, please contact us through the contact form.

sections.title: Updates to This Policy
sections.body: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or technology. Updates will be posted on this page with a new effective date.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.body:
This Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how they are used on our website, and what choices you have for managing them.

Cookies are small text files stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help the site remember your actions and preferences.

sections.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
sections.body:
Our website currently uses only **analytics cookies**:

- **Analytics cookies (Google Analytics):** Collect anonymous information about how visitors use the website.
- Help us improve performance and content.

We do **not** use cookies for advertising purposes or for tracking across other websites.

sections.title: 3. Google Analytics
sections.body:
We use **Google Analytics**, a service provided by Google LLC, to better understand how our website is used.

- **Purpose:** Measure traffic and performance.
- **Data:** Anonymous usage information (no personal identification).
- **Duration:** Cookies may remain on your device for up to 2 years, but are refreshed with each visit.
- **Data transfer:** Information may be stored on Google servers outside the EU.
- **IP anonymization:** IP addresses are anonymized within the EU before being sent to Google.

Learn more: [Google Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/privacy)

sections.title: 4. Managing Cookies and Consent
sections.body:
You have full control over cookies:

1. **Consent via banner** – Accept or reject cookies when you first visit the website.
2. **Withdraw consent** – Delete cookies through your browser settings.
3. **Browser settings:**
   - [Chrome](https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/95647)
   - [Firefox](https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/delete-cookies-remove-info-websites-stored)
   - [Safari](https://support.apple.com/guide/safari/manage-cookies-and-website-data-sfri11471/mac)
   - [Edge](https://support.microsoft.com/microsoft-edge/delete-cookies-in-microsoft-edge-63947406-40ac-c3b8-57b9-2a946a29ae09)

Disabling cookies will not block access to the website, but some features may not work as smoothly.
